0111111001001110 0100110101101110 1 -> sum: 1100101110111101, cout: 0

1110001100001000 0101000101110001 0 -> sum: 0011010001111001, cout: 1

0111010001001110 1101000110101110 0 -> sum: 0100010111111100, cout: 1
